title: CUSAT Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 03 Technical Assistant Grade III Posts
description: Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT) has announced the official notification for 2026. Allotted 03 vacancies for Technical Assistant Grade III Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the CUSAT Notification 2026 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the last date of...
